title: 94/861/EC: Commission Decision of 20 December 1994 amending Decision 93/693/EC concerning a list of semen collection centres approved for the export to the Community of deep-frozen semen of domestic animals of the bovine species (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 20 December 1994 amending Decision 93/693/EC concerning a list of semen collection centres approved for the export to the Community of deep-frozen semen of domestic animals of the bovine species (Text with EEA relevance)  (94/861/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
The Annex to Decision 93/693/EC is amended as follows:
1. In Part 1, the semen collection centre
'CENTRE D'INSÉMINATION ARTIFICIELLE DU QUÉBEC (CIAQ),
PO Box 518,
Saint-Hyacinthe, Québec,
J25 7B8.
Approved premises:
875 Boulevard Laurier,
Saint-Hyacinthe, Québec.
Approval code: CAN 073'
is replaced by the following:
'CENTRE D'INSÉMINATION ARTIFICIELLE DU QUÉBEC (CIAQ)
PO Box 518,
Saint-Hyacinthe, Québec,
J25 7B8.
Approved premises:
(i) 875 Boulevard Laurier,
Sainte Madeleine, Québec.
(ii) 3450 Sicotte Street,
Saint-Hyacinthe, Québec.
Approval code: CAN 073'.
2. A Part 11 is added with the following semen collection centre in respect of the Slovak Republic.
'PART 11
THE SLOVAK REPUBLIC
Plemenarske sluzby s.p.,
Odstepny závad Bratislava,
Plemenarska stanica bykov Luzianky,
951.41 Luzianky,
Slovakia.
Approval code: ISB SR 01.'
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 20 December 1994.
For the Commission
René STEICHEN
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 194, 22. 7. 1988, p. 10.
(2) OJ No L 186, 30. 6. 1993, p. 28.
(3) OJ No L 320, 22. 12. 1993, p. 35.
(4) OJ No L 241, 16. 9. 1994, p. 23.
